description.en: The Registrar of Companies is under the remit of the Registrar General, which is a part of the Office of the Attorney General and Department of Justice. This Registrar is responsible for the registration of companies within Kenya, and maintains a database, the records of which can be accessed on request for a fee.

access.onlineAccessDetails: A company name search can be conducted by either registering with the ebusiness.go.ke service, or asking the government to search the name at a cost of KES 100 per name
